start.name: Start Room
start.description: You are in a small, dimly lit room. There’s a door to the north.

hall.name: Hall
hall.description: You are in a grand hallway with doors to the east, west, and south.

library.name: Library
library.description: The library is filled with ancient books. A stick rests on a high shelf.

kitchen.name: Kitchen
kitchen.description: The kitchen smells of stale food. There's a locked door to the cellar to the south.

roomActions.message: You unlock the door to the cellar.

cellar.name: cellar
cellar.description: A dark, damp cellar with a faint smell of aged wine. There’s a large wine cabinet against one wall.

roomActions.message: You move the cabinet, revealing a secret passage to the garden!

garden.name: garden
garden.description: The garden has an apple tree at its center. There is something hanging from a branch.

roomActions.message: Using the stick, you retrieve a golden ring from the tree.
